attributes.action: Stop funfair taking place on Milton Forge!
attributes.background:
The Milton Forge is a small recreational ground in a built up residential area surrounded by bungalows and majority elderly residents.

We have lots of wildlife, including swans who are nesting next to the field for the second year running.

Our community is cared for and oppose it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the issue you raise. This appears to be the responsibility of Hull City Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://www.hullcc.gov.uk/petitions
